content.raw:
Thank you Nate. The simulation `ver1` yesterday \(robotika, simple\_tunnel\_02, 83e49d56-2d53-4818-a4d5-aac8a2a6171b\) terminated as `ver0`, i.e. there was probably no command sent from Python code. On which IP address is ROS master? I use `"ros_master_uri": "http://127.0.0.1:11311"` - could this be a problem? In “roslaunch-sim-83e49d56-2d53-4818-a4d5-aac8a2a6171b-comms-rbt1-52.log” I see `[roslaunch][INFO] 2019-09-23 14:24:26,046: master.is_running[http://10.36.176.2:11311]`??

thanks
content.html:
Thank you Nate. The simulation ver1 yesterday (robotika, simple_tunnel_02, 83e49d56-2d53-4818-a4d5-aac8a2a6171b) terminated as ver0, i.e. there was probably no command sent from Python code. On which IP address is ROS master? I use "ros_master_uri": "http://127.0.0.1:11311" - could this be a problem? In “roslaunch-sim-83e49d56-2d53-4818-a4d5-aac8a2a6171b-comms-rbt1-52.log” I see [roslaunch][INFO] 2019-09-23 14:24:26,046: master.is_running[http://10.36.176.2:11311]??
